text: The Battle of Dabusiyya was fought between the Ghaznavid Empire and the Kara- Khanid Khanate in April 1032 near Dabusiyya, a small town between Bukhara and Samarkand. The result was a bloody stalemate which left the commander of the Ghaznavid forces, Altun Tash, mortally wounded. ==References== Category:1032 in Asia Category:1030s conflicts Category:Battles involving the Ghaznavid Empire
title: Battle of Dabusiyya
